title: Iceberg table creation in watsonx.data
author: Munendra Singh
description: This asset facilitates the creation of Iceberg tables in Watsonx.data from existing Hive tables. It seamlessly converts and migrates data, leveraging Watsonx.data's capabilities for enhanced data management and querying.

installDependencyCommands: pip install presto-python-client minio==7.2.5 pandas==1.5.3 numpy==1.25.2
